name: Gakuen Redux
description:
"regret"

In Gakuen Redux the past, the present and the future come together. The only love, the only regret and the only second chance. This is really her. This is the awakening… to the final school story.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2005-07-29. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The art was done by Kathryn. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. Music was composed by evo. Estimated completion time is 7 hours.

Gakuen Redux is game Nr. 7 of the Original 22.
